name: A Night with Apples and Friends (Widescreen)
name_original: A Night with Apples and Friends (Widescreen)
description:
A Night with Apples and Friends (ANwAaF) is an old fnaf fangame project I started back in middle school and now I have reuploaded it onto scratch with much more characters and updates and now uploaded it onto here with a larger resolution.

(Music or sounds in the game do not belong to me in anyway)
